Class Trip

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trip

  • public class Trip
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle the trips between Passengers and Drivers
    Author:
    Avinash Sharma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trip(double rate, Driver driver, Passenger pass)
      Constructs a Trip with the specified rate, current Driver, and current Passenger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateFare()
      Calculates the fare of the ride by multiplying the distance from the Passenger to their destination by the specified rate
      double distanceFromDriverToPass()
      Calculates the distance from the Driver to the Passenger
      double distanceFromPassToDest()
      Calculates the distance from the Passenger to their destination
      double estimatedTimeArrival()
      Gets the ETA of the Driver to the Passenger with each unit of distance specified as 1 minute
      Driver getDriver()
      Gets the current driver of the trip
      Passenger getPassenger()
      Gets the current passenger of the trip
      double getRate()
      Gets the rate of the trip

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Trip

        public Trip(double rate,
            Driver driver,
            Passenger pass)
        Constructs a Trip with the specified rate, current Driver, and current Passenger
        Parameters:
        rate - specified rate from text file
        driver - the current Driver
        pass - the current Passenger

      • estimatedTimeArrival

        public double estimatedTimeArrival()
        Gets the ETA of the Driver to the Passenger with each unit of distance specified as 1 minute
        Returns:
        the ETA of the Driver to reach the Passenger

      • calculateFare
